sentences: David Vélez (born in 1973 in Bogotá, Colombia) is a sound artist/composer.
Since 2006, Vélez has participated in a series of exhibitions and art festivals such as:
Frecuencias’ (2012 Plazarte Gallery, Medellín) also with the 4-18 Foundation,
David Vélez works as content manager, curator and publisher for Impulsive Habitat a label he cofounded in 2009 that focuses on the publication of phonographic and musique concréte works.
